titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation of His Majesties grace, favour, and pardon, to the inhabitants of His county of Berks.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at Our court at Oxford, this first day of November, in the eighteenth year of Our reigne.
Arms 37; Steele notation: severall gracious them.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
